org.gearman
Class GearmanLostConnectionPolicy.Action

java.lang.Object
  org.gearman.GearmanLostConnectionPolicy.Action
Enclosing interface:
GearmanLostConnectionPolicy
public static final class GearmanLostConnectionPolicy.Action
extends java.lang.Object

A class who's objects represent an action the gearman service should take when a job server disconnects.

Author:
isaiah

Method Summary
Modifier and Type Method and Description
static GearmanLostConnectionPolicy.Action dropServer()
          Tells the calling service to drop the server from its control
static GearmanLostConnectionPolicy.Action reconnectServer()
          Tells the calling service to reconnect at it's own discretion
static GearmanLostConnectionPolicy.Action reconnectServer(long time, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
          Tells the calling service to reconnect no earlier then the the specified delay

                                                                 java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
Tells the calling service to reconnect no earlier then the the specified delay

Parameters:
time - The amount of time that must pass before any attempts to reconnect can occur
unit - The unit time
